INVALID_SUBTOTAL: This coupon cannot be applied on the current cart (subtotal is too less)
INVALID_CUSTOMER: This coupon was generated for another customer
INVALID_CATEGORY: This coupon cannot be applied to any of your items
INVALID_ITEMS: This coupon cannot be applied to any of your items
INVALID_PLATFORM: This coupon cannot be applied to this device
INVALID_SALEITEM: This coupon cannot be applied to items on sale
INVALID_USAGELIMIT: This coupon is already been used
INVALID_CUSTOMER_ALLOWED_FOR_NEW_USER: The coupon is valid only for first purchase.
INVALID_CUSTOMER_USAGE_LIMIT: The coupon usage limit is exhausted.

invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
failedResetPasswordRequest: Error on password reset request, email address not found.
minLength: Phone Number must be more than 8 digits
maxLength: Phone Number cannot be more than 15 digits
